Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: I think the recent refactor of the top level TOC does improve navigation, but the fact that the TOC appears twice is problematic. Any ideas on that ~joe-alewine ~odowdaibm ~ChristopherFerris ?

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: Agree, the duplication is problematic. The formatting is also bad as the words shrink more and more, getting to a point of being hard to read.Â
